comprehensive_overview: mkl-service is part of the Intel Math Kernel Library (MKL) that provides optimized performance for mathematical, scientific, and engineering computations on Intel architectures. It provides a set of routines optimized for use with Intel processors.
core_features:
1. Optimized mathematical functions for Intel processors
2. Accelerated linear algebra and FFT functions
3. Support for various numerical computations
4. Integration with other Intel performance libraries
5. Enhanced performance and scalability on Intel hardware
